assessment.name: Green Goods Assessment
assessment.description: Flexible assessment schema for Green Goods gardens. Captures impact across 8 forms of capital with flexible metrics stored in IPFS JSON, along with evidence media and impact attestation references.

work.name: Green Goods Work Submission
work.description: Work submission schema for Green Goods protocol. Enables gardeners to submit completed regenerative agriculture tasks with media evidence and metadata for verification and payment.

workApproval.name: Green Goods Work Approval
workApproval.description: Work approval schema for Green Goods protocol. Allows validators to approve or reject submitted work with feedback, enabling trustless verification of regenerative agriculture activities.
